channel.title: Compiling help?
channel.description: hi i have java 6 update 10. what should i do to compile? can you also give me a mini tutorial for how to do the environmental thing? thanks

item.title: Compiling help?
item.dc:creator: @usualpker usualpker
item.description:
@usualpker wrote:

[quote=“gamma, post:11, topic:240397”]are you using a 508?[/quote]soz was gonetrick or treating. no its a 317[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 31, 2008, 05:51:10 pm[/size][hr][quote=“XxJtxX, post:8, topic:240397”]Make a batch file and put this in it.

@echo off Title It's a compiler.. What more do you want?! "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause [/quote]system cannot find path specified... press any key to continue... what now

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling help?
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

[quote=“XxJtxX, post:12, topic:240397”][quote author=usualpker link=topic=316712.msg2514473#msg2514473 date=1225493251]

alright then replae your compiler code with this

@echo off cd Source "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./*java pause
[/quote]system cannot find path specified... system cannot find path specified... press any key to continue...[/code[
what now…?

That compiler is ONLY for 508 server’s use the one i replied. That is the one for normal server’s.[/quote]

no its not? i have a 317 source rofl.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling help?
item.dc:creator: @XxJtxX XxJtxX
item.description:
@XxJtxX wrote:

[quote=“usualpker, post:10, topic:240397”][quote author=gamma link=topic=316712.msg2514458#msg2514458 date=1225492375]
alright then replae your compiler code with this

@echo off cd Source "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./*java pause
[/quote]system cannot find path specified... system cannot find path specified... press any key to continue...[/code[
what now…?[/quote]
That compiler is ONLY for 508 server’s use the one i replied. That is the one for normal server’s.

item.title: Compiling help?
item.dc:creator: @usualpker usualpker
item.description:
@usualpker wrote:

[quote=“gamma, post:4, topic:240397”]click compile.bat in your server files.
If it says You do not have any version of JDK 6 blaa blaa blaa or something like that then just change the path.

Also no requesting TuT’s ;)[/quote]okay… ill try… but all i’m asking for is do i do the “jdk 1.6.10” (or whatever) on the variable name or variable value?

Read full topic

item.description:
@gamma wrote:

click compile.bat in your server files.
If it says You do not have any version of JDK 6 blaa blaa blaa or something like that then just change the path.

Also no requesting TuT’s
